argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elprob | |- ( P e. Prob <-> ( P e. U. ran measures /\ ( P ` U. dom P ) = 1 ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simplbi | |- ( P e. Prob -> P e. U. ran measures ) |
| 3 |  | #P_measbasedom | |- ( P e. U. ran measures <-> P e. ( measures ` dom P ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylib | |- ( P e. Prob -> P e. ( measures ` dom P ) ) |
